ygData.subject: Re: Research above Lev. 29 for wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... According to a message that was posted on the Magicians ONElist, relayed by the Guy that does the spells for EQ. (sorry I forgot his name).  There
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
> Also, are
>the rumors true about secret spell books? (other than the known 4)
>
>Jeannot Lev 22 WIZ <Societus Argenti>
>Karana Server

According to a message that was posted on the Magicians ONElist, relayed by
the Guy that does the spells for EQ. (sorry I forgot his name). There are
spells that can not be bought for all classes. Whos to say that they are
listed in those books. He did say that once the mysterious spells were
discovered by many others they may eventually become sold on vendors. He
also said that they did some pretty nice things. I am assuming that it
works this way for all classes and not just magicians.


Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
